content.query:
use FnO
go

create or alter view raw.vw_dCostCenter as 
  select t1.RecId as [Key]
        ,t1.OMOperatingUnitNumber as CC
        ,t1.Name as CostCenter 
    from raw.DirPartyTable t1 
   where t1.OMOperatingUnitType = 2 
     and t1.InstanceRelationType = 8363
go

-- select * from raw.vw_dCostCenter

-- Need to also delete the storage in data lake
drop external table dw.dCostCenter
go

create external table dw.dCostCenter with (
    location = 'DataWarehouse/dCostCenter'
   ,data_source = ParquetStorage
   ,file_format = ParquetFormat
) as 
    select * from raw.vw_dCostCenter
go

-- select * from raw.vw_dCostCenter
-- select * from dw.dCostCenter
